column5: I like doing family history and finding out who may be in my family tree , i came across this picture of a commercial fisherman taken around the turn of the centry , i believe it was said this gentle man was born in 1896 and fished the waters between Ontario and Quebec to earn his living ,  i did'nt know there was commercial fishing going on at that time so close to here . Sure would be nice to know this gentle man's full name , and one here have any clue who he may be ? Sorry this is the only size picture i have . Thanks every one for having a look .
Thats Roy when he was  younger...
Too tall to be Roy! Or that's a really small fish.
Exactly !!!!! Exactly what i said to Ron when he showed it to me.
Ok Roy , if we can keep this one and delete the other two i would be greatful .
Lets corral this one and let the other two get away.........
Probably blown ashore more than once on the Quebec side... West wind and all...
